ClassDesc: This class is the listener used to handle Trigger Sensors. Trigger Sensors are sensors that trigger an event and are automatically disabled. @B_android#hardware#Sensor#TYPE_SIGNIFICANT_MOTION_E@ is one such example. @B_android#hardware#SensorManager_E@ lets you access the device's @B_android#hardware#Sensor_E@. Get an instance of @B_android#hardware#SensorManager_E@ by calling @B_android#content#Context#getSystemService_E@ with the argument @B_android#content#Context#SENSOR_SERVICE_E@.
